summary: After a mysterious blackout, a son goes out to investigate and captures footage of actual aliens. When the aliens follow him and his brothers back to their home, all hell breaks loose.
cast: Benz Antoine|Kristian Ayre|Gillian Barber|Michael Buie|Emmanuelle Chriqui|Marya Delver|Katlyn Ducharme|Ingrid Kavelaars|Aaron Pearl|Dean Alioto|Bart Anderson|Gary Hetherington|Gareth Moses|Suzanne Ristic|Jim Smith|Oliver Tan|Shahai Khademi|Myles Wolf|Zbyszek Kazak|Janine Sikora|Anthony Beninati|Rick Cramer|Andy Geller|Amanda Harvey|Douglas Jackson|David Kaufman|Jill Murray|Forbes Riley|Sam Turner
title: Alien Abduction: Incident in Lake County
